trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Oakland
There were no other sightings in Oakland on or around November 4th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsi leave my blinds open about a foot and a half so the dog can go out .my sliding glass door and blinds . they look south to the oakland airport from alameda, i am wondering have you heard of anything on nov 4 2010 around 9pm i saw what looked like bright falling star but it went straight down not sideways it had blues yellows and orange shooting out of the side as it fell i never saw anything like it, has anyone else seen it? thankyou
